org.fujion.websocket

Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.websocket.Session
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockSession

    public class Session
extends Object
    Container for core resources for a single client session (i.e., web socket connection).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ATTR_SESSION 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Session(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext, org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession socket)
      Create a session, with references to its servlet context and web socket.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        protected void destroy()
        Destroy the session. This destroys the associated page.

      • getId

        public String getId()
        Returns the session's id, which is the same as the underlying web socket id.

        The session's id.

        Updates the session's last activity.

        public Synchronizer getSynchronizer()
        Returns the synchronizer associated with the session.

      • getPage

        public Page getPage()
        Returns the page associated with the session.
        Returns:
        The page.

      • getAttributes

        public Map<String,Object> getAttributes()
        Returns the attribute map associated with the session. This is a convenience method for accessing the attribute map of the underlying web socket session.
        Returns:
        The attribute map.

      • addSessionListener

        public boolean addSessionListener(ISessionListener listener)
        Register a session listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - Session listener to register.
        Returns:
        True if the operation was successful.

      • removeSessionListener

        public boolean removeSessionListener(ISessionListener listener)
        Unregister a session listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - Session listener to unregister.
        Returns:
        True if the operation was successful.

      • notifySessionListeners

        protected void notifySessionListeners(ClientRequest request)
        Notify all session listeners of a client request event.
        Parameters:
        request - The client request.

      • notifySessionListeners

        protected void notifySessionListeners(ClientInvocation invocation)
        Notify all session listeners of a client invocation event.
        Parameters:
        invocation - The client invocation.

      • ping

        public void ping(String data)
        Send a ping to the client.
        Parameters:
        data - Data to send with the ping.

      • _init

        protected boolean _init(String pageId)
        Initialize the session. If already initialized, this only validates that the page id matches that of the associated page. Otherwise, it associates the session with the page specified by the page id.
        Parameters:
        pageId - The page id.
        Returns:
        True if initialization took place.
